title: Prohibition
context: PART II. NOISE CONTROL [ยง342F-30] Prohibition. No person, including any public body, shall engage in activity which produces excessive noise without first securing approval in writing from the director; provided that this section shall not apply to any school activity which is approved by school authorities. For purposes of this section, &ldquo;school activity&rdquo; means a public or private school function for students up through the twelfth grade which is approved by the school principal or an authorized representative. These activities shall be limited to the hours of 7:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. [L 1989, c 212, pt of ยง3] Cross References Noise and climate control at school facilities, see ยง302A-1501.
